text:
RELIGION

Sath Sangh, Kailasapuram : Radha kalyana mahotsavam, musical discourse by Ashwin Kumar, BHEL Township, 7 p.m.

Sri Vishnu Sahasranama Parayana Sabha : Sri Vishnu Sahasranama parayanam, Cauvery Thayar Sannidhi, Amma Mandapam, 6 p.m.

Sri Rama Nama Sath Sangam: Sri Rama nama parayanam, 55, I Main Street, SMESC Colony, 6 p.m.

GENERAL

National Institute of Technology Department of Instrumentation and Control Engineering : ACODS - international conference on Advances in control and optimisation of dynamical systems, 9 a.m.

Bharathidasan University: Department of Environmental Management, Workshop on ‘Entrepreneurship: scope and opportunities in Green energy technologies’, D. Sivalingam, former Chief Engineer, Public Works Department, delivers special address, V.M. Muthukumar, Vice Chancellor, presides, Seminar Hall, 9.15 a.m.

National College : Department of English and The English Literary Association, Yan Gong, from School of English and International Studies, Beijing Foreign Studies University, speaks on ‘English language teaching in China’, College Auditorium, 10.30 a.m.

Seethalakshmi Ramaswami College : Department of Chemistry, Chemistry Association meeting, S. R. Bheeter, faculty from St. Joseph’s College, speaks on ‘Chemical periodicity’, Sri Meda Saraswathi Hall, 9.45 a.m.

Ponsiva Research and Innovation Trust and Innovation Incubator of Nehru Memorial College : Innovation trigger camp, college campus, Puthanampatti, 3.15 p.m.

Tamil Nadu Handicrafts Development Corporation : Crafts Bazzar, Kailasapuram Club, BHEL, 10 a.m. to 8 p.m.

Bishop Heber College : Department of Social Work, Programme on ‘Occupational therapy for children with special needs’, P.M. Arun Kumar, Occupational Therapist, chief guest, Blossom Special School Auditorium, Holy Cross College campus, 9.30 a.m.

M.A.M. College of Engineering: “MATLAB workshop for Electrical Engineers,” S. Saravana Elango of National Institute of Technology, Tiruchi, resource person, 9.30 a.m.

AIMAN College of Arts and Science for Women : Dato Thasleem Mohamed Ibrahim, Executive Chairman, TMI-Group of Companies, Malaysia, speaks on “Interpersonal Relationships,” noon.

North Eastern Handicrafts and Handlooms Development Corporation : North East crafts bazaar, SRT Hall, Thillai Nagar, 10 a.m. to 9 p.m.
title: tiruchi today
